Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and the faded remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T25 Wall 57
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393604) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393604)
